short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Code used from APE browser addon to connect Oracle APEX PageDesigner and APE watchlist.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Add-On initializes a broadcast channel in Oracle Page Designer and allows APEX Project Eye applications to retrieve the application and page ids that are being edited. It injects a line of javascript code that is executed only if Page Designer is detected. Broadcast channels allow communication between tabs/windows within the same domain in the same browser.
